column3: Here you can practice the basics of chocobo racing.
column4: All race chocobos will carry their rider to the end of a course. However, only a skilled jockey can guide his steed to victory.
column7: Here you can practice the basics of chocobo racing.
column8: All race chocobos will carry their rider to the end of a course. However, only a skilled jockey can guide his steed to victory.

column2: To accelerate, press and hold the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Move Forward<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> key.
column6: First, tilt the left stick up, or press <CommandIcon(12)/> key to accelerate.

column2: Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.
column3: Continue to accelerate and observe the effects. Once your chocobo's stamina is completely depleted, your speed will drop, and you will no longer be able to accelerate.
column6: Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.
column7: Continue to accelerate and observe the effects. Once your chocobo's stamina is completely depleted, your speed will drop, and you will no longer be able to accelerate.

column2: Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>lathered<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and lose stamina even more quickly!
column3: To alleviate this condition, press the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Move Back<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> key to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.
column6: Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>lathered<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and lose stamina even more quickly!
column7: To alleviate this condition, tilt the left stick down to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.

column3: Press the <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Move Left<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> and <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Move Right<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> keys to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.
column7: Tilt the left stick to the left and right to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.

column2: Scattered throughout the course are <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>magicked panels<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> which bestow various effects when triggered.
column3: To trigger a magicked panel, steer your chocobo towards it.
column6: Scattered throughout the course are <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>magicked panels<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> which bestow various effects when triggered.
column7: To trigger a magicked panel, steer your chocobo towards it.

column2: Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!
column3: In addition to steering away from panels, you can also <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>jump<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to avoid them.
column6: Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!
column7: In addition to steering away from panels, you can also <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>jump<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground> to avoid them.

column2: In addition to magicked panels, you may come across treasure coffers containing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>race items<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
column3: Some treasure coffers will be suspended in midair, so to obtain the race items within, you will need to jump.
column6: In addition to magicked panels, you may come across treasure coffers containing <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>race items<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>.
column7: Some treasure coffers will be suspended in midair, so to obtain the race items within, you will need to jump.

column2: Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.
column6: Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.

column2: This concludes the chocobo racing training course.
column3: You may repeat this course at any time should you wish to review the fundamentals.
column6: This concludes the chocobo racing training course.
column7: You may repeat this course at any time should you wish to review the fundamentals.
